title: Sound On: Guns Deal Framework, Jan 6 Hearing Recap
itunes:title: Sound On: Guns Deal Framework, Jan 6 Hearing Recap
description:
Today's guests: Jess Menton, Bloomberg News Equities Reporter, Massachusetts Congressman Stephen Lynch, Bloomberg Politics Contributor Jeanne Sheehan Zaino, Republican Strategist Doug Heye, and AGF Investments Chief U.S. Policy Strategist, Greg Valliere.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
